headline: ADP Award And US$6b Buyback Reframe Shareholder Return Outlook
summary: Automatic Data Processing (NasdaqGS:ADP) received a Software Excellence Award recognizing customer satisfaction and product performance. The board approved a $6b share repurchase program, signaling continued capital return to shareholders. These developments come as the stock trades at $209.96, following recent share price pressure. For investors watching Automatic Data Processing at $209.96, the combination of an industry award and a $6b buyback authorization adds fresh context to recent...

headline: A Look At Automatic Data Processing (ADP) Valuation After Earnings Beat Buyback Plan And 52 Week Low
summary: Automatic Data Processing (ADP) has jumped onto investors radars after fiscal Q2 2026 earnings beat expectations, a fresh $6b share repurchase authorization, and insider selling coincided with the stock hitting a new 52 week low. See our latest analysis for Automatic Data Processing.
